title: #120: The Planned Destruction of Society
description:
By all accounts from anyone actually paying attention to what is happening these days, we are in the early stages of the collapse of society. It is hard to imagine and very terrifying, but obvious if we get honest about the signs that we are seeing.

The secondary question that one must grapple with is whether or not this destruction is organic and cyclical, or planned and orchestrated? If this is indeed planned, what are the ramifications of that on us and what is the play that the Globalists are planning to make in the ashes of our society?
